scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach exec rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:hard: yarn clean:cache && yarn clean && yarn clean:nm
scripts.release: yarn build && yarn test && yarn bump && npm publish --access public --workspaces
scripts.bump: npm version -ws $(npm view @ddd-ts/model dist-tags.latest | tr -d '"' | awk -F'[.-]' '{ print $1 "." $2 "." $3 "-" $4+1 }')
